name: Lecture 2 - Additional Tools + Critique
description:
Lecture 2 of Figma Decal. Examining collaboration tools like comments, pencil, styles and exporting. Diving into color theory/communication, type, and critique.


Created by Caden Choi and Tiffany Mao.
